Html:
Good afternoon, I'm using this excellent library, and everything works fine until I add many markers to the map, when I use the GMarkerGoogleType.green_pushpin all the marker are displayed on the map, but when I use my own icon for the markers there is a following error:

'System.OutOfMemoryException' in mscorlib.dll

And the implementation comes out, someone could help me, thank you.
